participant_1.background:

I have never been arrested but my parents are worried I'm lonely.
i am a nurse at a hospital.
my two dogs are the best friends a girl could have.
rita hayworth is the woman of my dreams.

i love watching sitcoms on television.
i like to play soccer , draw and read asterix.
My favorite websites are those that help me with my addiction recovery and those that offer suspense novels.
No, I prefer to wear comfortable clothes.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I am doing pretty good, how about you?
I am doing well, thank you. I am just trying to figure out what I want to do with my life.
That is a tough question. What are you thinking about doing?
I am not sure. I am thinking about going back to school to be a nurse.
That is a good choice. I know a lot of people who are nurses and they all seem to really enjoy their job.
Yeah, I think it would be a good fit for me. I am a people person and I like helping others.
That is a great trait to have as a nurse. I am sure you would be great at it.
Thank you, I hope so. I just need to figure out how to pay for school.
There are a lot of financial aid options available. You should look into them.
I will, thank you for the advice.
No problem. I am always happy to help.
They are doing well. They are retired now and they love to travel.
That is great. I am glad to hear that.
They are my best friends. I am so lucky to have them.
I am sure they are lucky to have you too.
Thank you, I think so too
